fields_of_interest: Culture, Education and training, Youth, Justice and Fundamental Rights
inter_groups: ARDI group within the European Parliament
eu_initiatives:
Intergroup on Religious Intolerance 
Intergroup on Racism, Diversity 
DG Education and Culture 
DG Justice, Fundamental Rights and Citizenship
organisation_name: Forum of European Muslim Youth and Student organisations (FEMYSO)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit: Our vision is to enable each member organisation to achieve their full potential within European society and thus contribute to the development of a diverse, cohesive and prosperous Europe. Our mission is to facilitate development, networking and cooperation between European Muslim youth and student organisations and to be their representative voice within all European institutions.
relevant_communication:
Promoting citizenship 
Fighting Islamophobia: the Iman project which is a program for civil society to monitor Islamophobia 
Inter-faith dialogue 
Brussels talks:  round table discussions which deal with topics of actual interest such as climate change and ethical economy. This would be in cooperation with a national or international organisations 
 
Education, training, youth empowerment more broadly
